text: Hey all - I am building a custom website using React / Node and am now to the point where I am implementing GDPR compliance. I have the cookie opt in banner working. Is there a way for HubSpot to manager placing the GA cookie as well on the custom site?
if you use the GA integration in HubSpot, then it will set it for you I believe
I will test and see if that works. I'm not using the HS site building tools however, so I was skeptical.
are you using the HubSpot embed code on your site pages?
you can maunally set it in GTM or in your own script if you prefer, but HS will handle it for you.. I mean, if you created your own gpdr banner, then just ignore all this
I'll look at this more closely. I did not make my own GDPR banner. I embedded hs-script-loader script tag.
